1331870.name: Real Kart
1331870.description:
Real Kart - If you are into motorsports and love karting, then this game is for you!
Training mode for assembling a real copy of the Kart:
You have the opportunity to learn how to assemble a Real Kart from scratch. This game can be used as a training manual for children and just pilots. After completing the training, you can easily assemble Karts in life! Since the 3D model has more than 800 parts: All nuts, bolts, cogs, washers, fasteners, cables, wires and much more!

Race on real karting tracks:
Race against the clock on the race track against your ghosts and become the first on the global leaderboard!
How to play:
Complete the first lap of the track as quickly as possible and without mistakes, with the second lap your first ghost will appear. It will repeat your previous circle. With each lap, your new ghost will be added. And with each lap it will be more and more difficult to overtake them. Only 5 laps in the race.

1 vs 1 racing mode:
Use two gamepads or just a keyboard, play with a friend on one PC, the monitor will be divided into two parts, vertically or horizontally.
We are trying to make the simulator interesting! If you like the game, we will add even more karting tracks and features, as well as multiplayer!
Good luck, pilot!
1331870.supported_languages:
英语*, 俄语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
